  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(String title, String summary, int duration, LocalDate releaseDate, boolean ov) throws Exception
      Constructor of the class Movie without parameter for Trailer.
      Parameters:
      title - This parameter is the Title of the movie.
      summary - This parameter is the Summary of the movie.
      duration - This parameter is the Duration of the movie.
      releaseDate - This parameter is the Release date of the movie.
      ov - This parameter is the OV of the movie.
      Throws:
      Exception - This exception is thrown when the duration is 0, negative or greater than the maximum duration.

    • Movie

      public Movie(String title, String summary, int duration, LocalDate releaseDate, boolean ov, String url, int trailerDuration, LocalDate trailerReleaseDate) throws Exception
      Constructor of the class Movie with parameter for Trailer.
      Parameters:
      title - This parameter is the Title of the movie.
      summary - This parameter is the Summary of the movie.
      duration - This parameter is the Duration of the movie.
      releaseDate - This parameter is the Release date of the movie.
      ov - This parameter is the OV of the movie.
      url - This parameter is the URL of the trailer.
      trailerDuration - This parameter is the Duration of the trailer.
      trailerReleaseDate - This parameter is the Release date of the trailer.
      Throws:
      Exception - This exception is thrown when the duration is 0, negative or greater than the maximum duration.
